short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts and finds the percent of each learning standard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to be used for students taking Physics 261 at Frostburg State University. It scans the grade tab of your Canvas account and will count the number of Pass, Pass+, Repairable and Not Yet's earned on quizes. And it will calculate percentages.
